original_title: Invented, Engineered, and Pioneered in Pittsburgh
overview: What connects Ferris Wheels with state of the art nuclear power plants? Why is there a connection between George Westinghouse and 21st century robotics? What’s the common thread that links John Roebling, Jonas Salk, the Mellon Arena and video games? It’s Pittsburgh’s amazing love and respect for innovation, great engineering and unfettered imagination.
title: Invented, Engineered, and Pioneered in Pittsburgh
